name: specialist-home.toml

description.summary: Specialist home screen with today's orders and active shift

rawContent:
# Specialist Home Route
# Main screen of the specialist app

[route]
id = "specialist-home"
path = "/prototype/specialist"
title = "My Work"

[page]
type = "authenticated"
role = "specialist"

[page.description]
summary = "Specialist home screen with today's orders and active shift"
features = [
  "Today's assigned orders",
  "Active shift status",
  "Quick actions"
]

[relations]
guards = ["authenticated", "specialist-only"]
roles = ["specialist"]
platforms = ["specialist-app"]

[implementation]
component = "SpecialistHome"
file = "src/prototype/pages/specialist/SpecialistHome.tsx"
status = "planned"
